Dataset name: Balearic Islands Air Quality Control Stations
Dataset brief description: Concentrations of pollutants SO2, NO, NO2, O3, PM10, PM2.5, benzene, toluene and xylene appear in micrograms per cubic meter (µg / m³). The units of the CO pollutant are milligrams per cubic meter (mg / m³). A "flag" or status indicator is included for each pollutant, where V means that the data is valid.
